author: krosenvold
msg: o Fixed javadocs before release, added docs about minor api changes.

author: minfrin
msg: - Build shared mpms instead of static, reduce the RPM to a simple one
pass build of the server into a single binary and modules.
- Create a dedicated generic RPM layout, ensuring that all example
config files have the correct paths embedded within them.

author: ivank
msg: BOOKKEEPER-122: Review BookKeeper server documentation (fpj & ivank)

author: danhaywood
msg: ISIS-141: improvement to html viewer handling of boolean properties if disabled

author: marvin
msg: LUCY-195 Revisit pthreads linkage on OpenBSD.
Use -lpthread instead of -pthread because it seems to work -- despite the fact
that the OpenBSD man page recommends -pthread.
